amendment.description: An amendment numbered 36 printed in Part B of House Report 118-242 to prohibit funding for plutonium pit production at the Savannah River Plutonium Processing Facility.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garamendi amendment (A020) Failed by recorded vote: 116 - 303 (Roll no. 544).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Garamendi amendment (A020) Failed by recorded vote: 116 - 303 (Roll no. 544).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
